test_message: Why do employees leave companies? Analyze the causal relationships.
expected_purpose: Identifies cause-effect relationships, constructs causal chains, detects confounders
validation_errors: Response is not valid JSON: Expecting value: line 1 column 1 (char 0)

actual_response.raw_text:
```json
{
  "status": "success",
  "result": {
    "causal_chains": [
      {
        "chain_id": "CC1",
        "cause": "Low compensation relative to market rates",
        "effect": "Employee departure",
        "mechanism": "Financial dissatisfaction creates opportunity cost perception, triggering job search behavior and eventual resignation",
        "strength": "strong",
        "intermediary_steps": [
          "Employee becomes aware of market salary disparities",
          "Financial stress or perceived undervaluation increases",
          "Active job search begins",
          "Competing offer received",
          "Cost-benefit analysis favors departure"
        ]
      },
      {
        "chain_id": "CC2",
        "cause": "Poor relationship with direct manager",
        "effect": "Employee departure",
        "mechanism": "Negative interpersonal dynamics reduce psychological safety and job satisfaction, creating hostile work environment that motivates exit",
        "strength": "strong",
        "intermediary_steps": [
          "Communication breakdown or conflict occurs",
          "Employee feels unsupported or micromanaged",
          "Work engagement decreases",
          "Stress and emotional exhaustion increase",
          "Decision to leave crystallizes"
        ]
      },
      {
        "chain_id": "CC3",
        "cause": "Lack of career advancement opportunities",
        "effect": "Employee departure",
        "mechanism": "Blocked career progression creates perception of stagnation, reducing future value of staying and prompting search for growth elsewhere",
        "strength": "strong",
        "intermediary_steps": [
          "Employee seeks promotion or new responsibilities",
          "Requests denied or opportunities unavailable",
          "Skills development plateaus",
          "Future career trajectory appears limited",
          "Alternative opportunities become attractive"
        ]
      },
      {
        "chain_id": "CC4",
        "cause": "Work-life imbalance",
        "effect": "Employee departure",
        "mechanism": "Excessive work demands deplete personal resources, causing burnout and prioritization of wellbeing over employment",
        "strength": "moderate",
        "intermediary_steps": [
          "Extended hours or inflexible schedules imposed",
          "Personal relationships and health suffer",
          "Burnout symptoms emerge",
          "Life satisfaction declines",
          "Search for better balance initiated"
        ]
      },
      {
        "chain_id": "CC5",
        "cause": "Organizational culture misalignment",
        "effect": "Employee departure",
        "mechanism": "Value incongruence creates cognitive dissonance and reduces sense of belonging, eroding commitment over time",
        "strength": "moderate",
        "intermediary_steps": [
          "Employee experiences values conflict",
          "Sense of authenticity at work diminishes",
          "Organizational identification weakens",
          "Cultural fit concerns accumulate",
          "Decision to seek aligned environment"
        ]
      },
      {
        "chain_id": "CC6",
        "cause": "Lack of recognition and appreciation",
        "effect": "Employee departure",
        "mechanism": "Unacknowledged contributions violate reciprocity expectations, decreasing motivation and organizational commitment",
        "strength": "moderate",
        "intermediary_steps": [
          "Employee contributions go unrecognized",
          "Perceived inequity develops",
          "Motivation and effort decline",
          "Emotional connection to work weakens",
          "Resignation becomes viable option"
        ]
      },
      {
        "chain_id": "CC7",
        "cause": "Limited learning and development opportunities",
        "effect": "Employee departure",
        "mechanism": "Skill obsolescence concerns and intellectual understimulation drive search for environments offering professional growth",
        "strength": "moderate",
        "intermediary_steps": [
          "Training requests denied or unavailable",
          "Skills become outdated",
          "Marketability concerns emerge",
          "Intellectual engagement decreases",
          "Alternative learning opportunities sought"
        ]
      },
      {
        "chain_id": "CC8",
        "cause": "Poor organizational communication",
        "effect": "Employee departure",
        "mechanism": "Information gaps create uncertainty and distrust, undermining confidence in leadership and organizational stability",
        "strength": "weak",
        "intermediary_steps": [
          "Critical information withheld or unclear",
          "Rumors and uncertainty proliferate",
          "Trust in leadership erodes",
          "Anxiety about job security increases",
          "Proactive job search initiated"
        ]
      },
      {
        "chain_id": "CC9",
        "cause": "Inadequate resources or tools",
        "effect": "Employee departure",
        "mechanism": "Chronic frustration from inability to perform effectively reduces job satisfaction and professional efficacy",
        "strength": "weak",
        "intermediary_steps": [
          "Employee lacks necessary tools or support",
          "Work quality or efficiency suffers",
          "Frustration accumulates",
          "Professional pride diminishes",
          "Better-resourced opportunities attractive"
        ]
      },
      {
        "chain_id": "CC10",
        "cause": "Company restructuring or instability",
        "effect": "Employee departure",
        "mechanism": "Organizational uncertainty triggers risk aversion and proactive job security seeking behavior",
        "strength": "moderate",
        "intermediary_steps": [
          "Layoffs, mergers, or strategic shifts announced",
          "Job security concerns intensify",
          "Morale and trust decline",
          "Preemptive job search begins",
          "Exit before potential involuntary separation"
        ]
      }
    ],
    "confounders": [
      {
        "variable": "External job market conditions",
        "affects": [
          "Employee departure",
          "Compensation satisfaction",
          "Retention effectiveness"
        ],
        "impact": "Strong job market increases departure rates by providing more alternatives, making retention factors appear less effective than they actually are"
      },
      {
        "variable": "Employee life stage and personal circumstances",
        "affects": [
          "Work-life balance importance",
          "Career advancement priorities",
          "Compensation requirements"
        ],
        "impact": "Personal factors (family status, age, financial needs) influence which organizational factors trigger departure, creating heterogeneous causal pathways"
      },
      {
        "variable": "Industry norms and practices",
        "affects": [
          "Compensation expectations",
          "Career mobility patterns",
          "Retention benchmarks"
        ],
        "impact": "Industry-specific standards shape what employees consider acceptable, moderating the impact of company-specific factors"
      },
      {
        "variable": "Employee personality traits",
        "affects": [
          "Job satisfaction",
          "Conflict response",
          "Retention likelihood"
        ],
        "impact": "Individual differences in conscientiousness, agreeableness, and openness influence both perception of workplace factors and propensity to leave"
      },
      {
        "variable": "Organizational tenure",
        "affects": [
          "Departure likelihood",
          "Compensation satisfaction",
          "Culture fit"
        ],
        "impact": "Longer tenure creates investment in relationships and benefits, acting as inertia against departure regardless of other dissatisfaction"
      }
    ],
    "dependencies": [
      {
        "variable_a": "Manager quality",
        "variable_b": "Recognition and appreciation",
        "relationship_type": "causal",
        "direction": "a_to_b"
      },
      {

        "variable_b": "Career advancement opportunities",
        "relationship_type": "causal",

      },
      {

        "relationship_type": "correlational",
        "direction": "bidirectional"
      },
      {

        "variable_b": "Burnout",
        "relationship_type": "causal",
        "direction": "a_to_b"
      },
      {

        "relationship_type": "causal",
        "direction": "a_to_b"
      },

        "relationship_type": "causal",

      },
      {

        "relationship_type": "causal",
        "direction": "a_to_b"
      },
      {

        "variable_b": "Career advancement",
        "relationship_type": "causal",
        "direction": "a_to_b"
      },
      {

        "variable_b": "Financial stress",
        "relationship_type": "causal",
        "direction": "a_to_b"
      },
      {

        "variable_b": "Job satisfaction",
        "relationship_type": "causal",
        "direction": "a_to_b"
      },
      {

        "variable_b": "Trust in leadership",
        "relationship_type": "causal",
        "direction": "a_to_b"
      },
      {
        "variable_a": "Trust in leadership",
        "variable_b": "Organizational commitment",
        "relationship_type": "causal",
        "direction": "a_to_b"
      },

        "variable_b": "Employee departure",
        "relationship_type": "causal",
        "direction": "a_to_b"

      {
        "variable_a": "Organizational commitment",
        "variable_b": "Employee departure",
        "relationship_type": "causal",
        "direction": "a_to_b"
      }
    ],
    "feedback_loops": [
      "Poor manager relationships → Decreased performance → Reduced advancement opportunities → Increased dissatisfaction → Worsened manager relationships",
      "Low recognition → Reduced effort → Lower performance → Less recognition → Further disengagement",
      "High turnover → Increased workload on remaining staff → Work-life imbalance → Burnout → Additional turnover",
      "Organizational instability → Employee departures → Further instability perception → Accelerated turnover",
      "Poor communication → Reduced trust → Lower engagement → Less upward feedback → Continued poor communication",
      "Inadequate development → Skill gaps → Performance issues → Reduced investment in development → Widening skill gaps"
    ]
  },
  "metadata": {
    "agent_name": "Causal Analysis Agent",
    "timestamp": "2025-01-20T10:30:00Z"
  }
```
